snippet: The celebrity chef Paula Deen and her younger brother, Bubba Hiers, have closed a Savannah seafood restaurant that served as the backdrop to a workplace discrimination lawsuit that stained her reputation.
abstract: Celebrity chef Paula Deen and her younger brother Bubba Hiers close Uncle Bubba's Seafood and Oyster House, restaurant that had served as backdrop to a workplace discrimination lawsuit that stained Deen's reputation.
lead_paragraph: The celebrity chef Paula Deen and her younger brother, Bubba Hiers, have closed a Savannah seafood restaurant that served as the backdrop to a workplace discrimination lawsuit that stained her reputation.

headline.main: Georgia: Paula Deen and Brother Shut a Restaurant
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Paula Deen and Brother Shut a Restaurant
